entry.data:
PARTLY SUNNY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 60S
EAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE EVENING, THEN A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
EAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
SOUTHEAST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH
GUSTS UP TO 35 MPH IN THE AFTERNOON
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 35 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS
BREEZY WITH HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
SOUTH WINDS 20 TO 25 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 35 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 60S

PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
BREEZY WITH HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING, THEN PARTLY CLOUDY AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
